name: Tr√É¬©bol
headline: Business onboarding automation for banks and lenders in Latin America
description: Trebol saves business' banks and lenders from parsing thousands of documents. With an API and tools for developers and legal ops teams Tr√É¬©bol helps onboard businesses in minutes instead of weeks.

founders.name: Fabian Torres, Founder
founders.description: Before Tr√É¬©bol, I led product a product team for a fintech co. I started my career in finance doing investments in Latam.

founders.name: Luis Sebastian Buitrago Le√É¬≥n, Founder
founders.description: Early employee @Lernico, a seed-stage ed-tech company. CFO for two family-owned businesses operating in healthcare services and real estate. Managed the construction of commercial real estate of >5,000 square meters. Optimized capital structure of the business group. Revamped accounting and controlling processes. Data analyst at the largest colombian pension fund where executed capital on real estate assets from $25M to $150M+.

generated_description:
**Tr√©bol: Revolutionizing Business Onboarding in Latin America**

Founded in 2021 and proudly a part of Y Combinator's W22 batch, Tr√©bol is a Colombian fintech startup that specializes in automating the onboarding process for banks and lenders across Latin America. The company‚Äôs mission is straightforward yet impactful: to streamline and modernize the way financial institutions onboard businesses, cutting down what used to be weeks of paperwork into mere minutes.

### What They Do

Tr√©bol initially emerged to tackle the significant pain points for banks and lenders‚Äînamely, the exhaustive task of parsing through thousands of documents. With its robust API, the company provides essential tools for developers and legal operations teams, facilitating the onboarding process in a seamless manner. The end result is a faster, more efficient method that not only enhances the user experience but also improves compliance with regulatory demands.

**Key Offerings:**
- **Document Automation:** Streamlines the handling of various business documents.
